user.create.validate.fullName.length: The name must be at least 3 letters.
user.create.validate.password.min.length: Password must have at least 6 digits.
user.create.fail.message: fail to save your data please verify the following fields: fullName, email, password (only numbers).
user.login.invalid.login.data: Please check the fields: email, password.
user.login.fail.to.login: Failed to login, please try again later.
user.login.forbidden: Access is denied, please login before proceeding.
study.event.validate.subject: The (subject) is required.
study.event.validate.source: The source of the study (source) is mandatory: ['ONLINE_COURSE','YOUTUBE','PDF/EBOOK','BOOK'].
study.event.validate.resource.name: The name of the study resource (resourceName) must be specified. Ex: curso de photoshop ...
study.event.validate.link.url: The link to the study resource must be a valid URL: Ex: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=88DS3Z8nOdY.
study.event.validate.estimated.time.posi: The estimated time (estimatedTime) must be a positive timestamp value: Ex: 1617737089623.
study.event.validate.is.concluded: The value for the resource's completion state (isConcluded) must be a boolean. Ex: true/false.
study.event.validate.conclusion.date.pos: The conclusion date of the resource (conclusionDate) must be a positive timestamp value: Ex: 1617737089623.
study.event.validate.user.id.positive: The user id must be a valid positive number.
study.event.validate.create.invalid.args: Please check the field data [subject, source, resourceName, estimatedTime, isConcluded, conclusionDate, image, link].
study.event.validate.create.user.id.inva: The user (user) informed does not correspond to the logged in user.
study.event.validate.estimate.time.posit: The value for (stimatedTime) must be a positive number.
study.event.validate.id.required: The study event id (number) is mandatory.
study.event.validate.id.positive: The study event id must be a positive integer.
study.event.not.found: The study event with id: %s was not found.
